channel.title: Moving Objects?
channel.description: If Somebody could give me a guide or lead me to a guide on how to move objects (Like a prayer alter) in your rsps, I would be very greatful :).

item.title: Moving Objects?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

gameObject.setTeleportTarget(Location location);

Your game objects should extend the Entity object, as they can be teleported, have facing directions, some can be attacked, and ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Objects?
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

Are you useing DeltaScape? If so find the coords of your object (by clicking on it and looking at your CMD) then search in client.java, say if your altar is (3099,3434,409), search those coords and type ::mypos where ever you want to put your altar then change the 2 first numbers.

Are you useing PI? Go into Objectmanager.java and do the same. Compile and run.

Read full topic
